root.name: Mouse Trap
root.description: Mouse Trap is virtually identical to Pac-Man, though it does have a couple of variations. The player is a mouse, attempting to eat all of the cheese on the board before being caught by the cats that roam the maze. On collecting special power pellets, which would immediately render Pac-Man invincible, the player can choose to store the power-up until needed. When activated, the power-up turns the mouse into a dog for a limited time, who can then chase and eat the cats. However, a hawk will randomly swoop down onto the board in an attempt to kill the mouse. The hawk will kill the mouse, even if it is in "dog mode."
